title: Accident Case-Based Project Learning for Strengthening Safety Decision-Making Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic safety management concepts and industrial fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training for administrators/leaders, requiring support for mobile learning environments utilizing smartphones

learning_goals: One can identify 80% or more risk factors by analyzing real-world industrial accident cases.
One can propose crisis response strategies using various safety decision-making frameworks.
One can derive improvement plans through team-based projects and conduct feasibility assessments.
In post-evaluation, 90% or more participants confirm the effectiveness of improved safety decision-making processes.

resources: Offline collaboration tools (flipcharts, Post-it notes, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
